advancements.bakuretsu.title: Бакурецу, бакурецу..
advancements.beam.description: Fire off a beam from the Mystic Staff of Explosive Mana Condensation
advancements.beam.title: BEEEEEEEEEEEEEAM
advancements.breadcrumbs.description: Killed your first villager with Morgan.
advancements.breadcrumbs.title: How many breads have you eaten in your life?
advancements.clarent.title: Young Warlock...
advancements.flying_pigs.description: Используй посох духовной дизориентации на свинье, сидя на ней верхом, чтобы взлететь.
advancements.flying_pigs.title: Когда свиньи научатся летать!
advancements.greater_grail.description: Watch out for this guy, he's nuts.
advancements.greater_grail.title: Activate a Greater Grail!
advancements.kodoku.description: Successfully made use of Kodoku for sympathetic magic.
advancements.kodoku.title: Worms and Voodoo
advancements.lesser_grail.description: You call that evil? Weak, weak.
advancements.lesser_grail.title: Activate a Lesser Grail!
advancements.mahoutsukai.description: Ты начертил круг на полу. Ты квалифицирован.
advancements.mahoutsukai.title: Стань Mahou Tsukai!
advancements.morgan.description: Killed your first villager with Morgan.
advancements.morgan.title: How many breads have you eaten in your life?
advancements.sword_in_the_lake.descripti: Получи новый меч, выбросив старый в озеро. Правда, леди видимо в отпуске.
advancements.sword_in_the_lake.title: Меч... в озере?
advancements.treasury_projection.descrip: Fired some weapons from the Treasury Projection Gauntlet
advancements.treasury_projection.title: Zasshu
block.mahoutsukai.mahoujin_black_flame: Mystic Eyes of the Black Flame
block.mahoutsukai.mahoujin_mystic_staff: Mystic Staff of Explosive Mana Condensation
mahoutsukai.acknowledge4: Ваше желание для меня закон, Хозяин!
mahoutsukai.book.alarm_boundary.desc: Магический круг сигнала является самым базовым видом магии кругов - он просто предупреждает вас о мобах и игроках, подошедших на расстояние (%%val2) к магическому кругу. %%n %%nОн поглощает %%val0 маны от владельца каждые %%val1 секунд(ы). %%n%%nМагический круг сигнала будет так же подавать сигнал мощность в 15 единиц, если что-то приблизится к нему.
mahoutsukai.book.alarm_boundary.name: Магический круг сигнала
mahoutsukai.book.alchemical_exchange.des: This circle will, once a day around the time of placement, convert blocks underneath it into random other blocks of the same class. For example, dirt may become sand, diamonds may become emeralds, etc. However, this only works on natural blocks, and will not work on things such as bricks or diamond blocks. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster per transformation.
mahoutsukai.book.ascension.desc: Данное заклинание, при использовании без ткани, перенесёт любые сущности (включая предметы и мобов) на самую высокую точку по Y, которую оно найдёт. Свиток с этим заклинанием всего лишь перенесёт использователя. %%n %%nЗаклинание потребляет %%val0 маны от владельца за 1 перенос.
mahoutsukai.book.ascension.name: Вознесение
mahoutsukai.book.binding_eyes.desc: When used, eye contact between the caster and any mob or player binds that mob or player in place. Players, however, can escape this binding by simply breaking eye contact. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on use.
mahoutsukai.book.binding_eyes.name: Mystic Eyes of Binding
mahoutsukai.book.black_flame_eyes.desc: When used, black flames will sprout at the caster's viewing location for a short time. These flames spread somewhat quickly, but do not consume blocks and inflict wither damage to those who come in contact with them. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.black_flame_eyes.name: Mystic Eyes of the Black Flame
mahoutsukai.book.borrowed_authority.desc: Borrow the authority of the gods with this scroll, which increases the caster's speed and power, to the extent that mobs hit while using it will break through walls. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.borrowed_authority.name: Borrowed Authority
mahoutsukai.book.boundaries.desc: Boundaries are a category of AOE spells which operate in a radius around a placed circle, and drain mana on a fixed basis. You can turn them on and off by right clicking them. A redstone signal will also invert their on/off status. %%n%%nBoundaries give off comparator output - 0 when off, 1 when on. %%n%%nLastly, boundary scrolls can be used to quickly place boundaries in another location.
mahoutsukai.book.boundaries.name: Boundaries
mahoutsukai.book.catalyst_exchange.desc: When placed on the floor, this circle will convert any powdered catalysts on top of it into a new random powdered catalyst. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster per transformation.
mahoutsukai.book.catalyst_exchange.name: Catalyst Exchange
mahoutsukai.book.catalysts.desc: There are seven catalysts representing each of the known categories of magic. Powdered Catalysts are created by taking a Hammer or a Mortar and Pestle, and smashing these catalysts.
mahoutsukai.book.catalysts.name: Catalysts
mahoutsukai.book.catalysts2.desc: The categories are: %%n%%nIron - Boundaries%%n%%nEnder Pearl - Displacement%%n%%nDiamond - Projection%%n%%nEmerald - Exchange%%n%%nGold - Mystic%%n%%nQuartz - Intelligence%%n%%nEnder Eye - Mystic Eyes
mahoutsukai.book.catalysts2.name: Catalysts (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.categories.desc: Boundaries deal with AOE effects centered on a magic circle.%%n%%nDisplacement spells deal with teleportation magic.%%n%%nProjection spells deal with weapons.%%n%%nExchange spells usually involve a trade of some sort, often to refund or generate mana.
mahoutsukai.book.categories.name: Spell categories
mahoutsukai.book.categories2.desc: Mystic spells are unique, often offenseive spells, which provide miscellaneous effects.%%n%%nMystic Eyes spells deal with sight based effects.%%n%%nIntelligence spells deal with decision making, often focused around entities.%%n%%nThere are also some rumored secret spells..
mahoutsukai.book.categories2.name: Spell categories (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.chronal_exchange.desc: When placed on the floor, this circle will generate mana for 12 hours a day, centered on the time of placement. For the other 12 hours, it will drain mana from the caster, gems, or mana circuits. %%n %%nIt will drain or restore %%val0 mana every so often.
mahoutsukai.book.chronal_exchange.name: Chronal Exchange
mahoutsukai.book.circuits.desc: Mana Circuits are blocks which store mana. Mana in them can be used by the player when nearby, as long as the player owns the block. Whoever right clicks a mana circuit first after it is placed owns the block. Right click to put mana in. Shift right click to turn it on or off.
mahoutsukai.book.circuits.name: Mana Circuits
mahoutsukai.book.clairvoyance.desc: When used, the caster will be able to see the predicted path of certain mobs. Unfortunately, some mobs are an enigma and cannot be predicted accurately, such as skeletons. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on use.
mahoutsukai.book.clairvoyance.name: Minor Clairvoyance
mahoutsukai.book.clarent.desc: A strengthened sword forged in dragon's breath, Clarent has one purpose: to overthrow the king. %%n%%nRather than retaining a damage value, Clarent instead does the damage of its opponent's weapon.%%n%%nClarent's passive, Vengeance, allows it to block attacks. Clarent remembers these attacks, and in its next attack will release its pent up frustrations.
mahoutsukai.book.clarent.name: Clarent the Usurper
mahoutsukai.book.clarent2.desc: Lastly, Clarent has the ability to mortally wound its target, leaving them wounds that will damage them should they move too quickly.
mahoutsukai.book.clarent2.name: Clarent the Usurper (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.cloth_optional.name: Ткань может использоваться
mahoutsukai.book.cloth_required.name: Ткань требуется
mahoutsukai.book.contract.desc: When two players create their own contract circles, and stand on them nearby, a contract will be formed between the players. Contracts allow players to bypass certain effects such as boundaries and some mystic eyes. To break a contract, one player need only damage the other. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from each player when a contract is formed.
mahoutsukai.book.contract.name: Contract
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven.desc: The most complex spell, and used primarily as a way of applying mass negative effects. When many of these circles are placed on the floor and activated by a scroll, the external convex polygon (google: Graham Scan) is calculated. The prime factors in the external polygon and those in the internal polygon determine the negative effects. All mobs and players within the external polygon at the time of activation receive these effects.
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven.name: Cup of Heaven (the Grail)
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven2.desc: For example, if a pentagon is made with 5 of these circles, with 4 internal circles (placed anywhere inside the pentagon), the affected mobs will receive Poison 2 and Blindness 1. Why? 4 = 2 * 2. The prime factor 2 maps to poison, and the prime factor 5 maps to blindness. These prime factors go up to 13, including Poison (2), Weakness (3), Blindness (5), Slowness(7), Wither (11), Levitation (13).
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven2.name: Cup of Heaven (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven3.desc: For a cup of heaven which grants poison 1 and wither 1, for example, you could simply create a 22-sided polygon and all mobs inside would be affected. %%n %%nMana cost varies depending on the effects and area covered.
mahoutsukai.book.cup_of_heaven3.name: Cup of Heaven (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.damage_exchange.desc: When used, the player will convert damage taken into mana a set number of times (not time-based). %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on use.
mahoutsukai.book.damage_exchange.name: Damage Exchange
mahoutsukai.book.damage_replication.desc: When used on another mob or player, this scroll will replicate damage and potions that affect the caster to the target. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on using the scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.damage_replication.name: Shared Pain
mahoutsukai.book.death_collection_eyes.d: When used, the caster collects souls upon seeing death - this death can occur in any way, but the caster does have to be looking at it. If the caster has collected enough souls, their death will be prevented in exchange for souls, whether or not the eyes are active. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.displacement_boundary.d: Магический круг переноса телепортирует сущности, которые попытались подойти на расстоянии (%%val2) с любой стороны от круга. Кроме того, он попробует перенести блоки, в которых данная сущность может задохнуться. %%n %%nДанный круг потребляет %%val0 маны от владельцы каждые %%val1 секунд(ы).
mahoutsukai.book.drain_life_boundary.des: The Boundary of Drain Life slowly drains health from nearby mobs in a range of %%val2. For every health drained, health, hunger, or mana is restored to the caster, in that order, according to the caster's needs. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.durability_exchange.des: When placed on the floor, this circle will convert the durability of items on top of it into mana. Alternatively, it can do so from a chest underneath it as well. %%n %%nIt can restore a maximum of %%val0 mana per second.
mahoutsukai.book.enclosure_boundary.desc: Магический круг барьера поднимает блоки вокруг вас дабы создать барьер шириной %%val1. %%n %%nДанный круг потребляет %%val0 маны от владельца за каждый слой поднятых блоков.
mahoutsukai.book.enclosure_boundary.name: Магический круг барьера
mahoutsukai.book.equivalent_displacement: An Equivalent Displacement circle on the ground can be linked (by shift-right-clicking) to another equivalent displacement circle anywhere in the world or across dimensions. However, a teleport between the two can only happen if there is something on BOTH circles. That something can be an item or mob, and the chunks must be loaded. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster per teleport.
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff.desc: Данный свиток призовёт посох со взрывной мощью. У посоха долгое время зарядки (луч в середине указывает на готовность), но в итоге он создаёт огромный взрвы. Shift + ПКМ будет переключать его режим на небольшие взрывы или режим луча.
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff.name: Посох конденсации взрывной маны
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff2.desc: В режиме луча, урон повышается вместе с временем использования. Так же, луч уничтожает блоки, с которыми контактирует. %%n %%nСвиток заберёт у использователя %%val0 маны, %%val1 маны будет использовано в режиме взрыва, %%val2 маны будет использовано с небольшими зарядами, и%%val3 маны за тик забирает режим луча.
mahoutsukai.book.explosion_staff2.name: Посох конденсации взрывной маны (прод.)
mahoutsukai.book.fae.desc: The Fae are spiritlike creatures that spawn near leylines. Like leylines, they can also only be seen with Mystic Eyes of Fay Sight. Their laughter sounds like bells, and they drop Fae Essence upon death.%%n%%n The Fae are particularly attracted to magic being performed on leypoints. %%n%%nThey are breedable through the use of any Powdered Catalyst.
mahoutsukai.book.fae.name: The Fae
mahoutsukai.book.fae_essence.desc: Fae Essence is dropped by the fae. Right clicking with fae essence will place a fae circle. Scrolls and stationary circles created by fae essence can be used by anyone. You can claim a fae circle by right clicking it, and it will drain mana from you when used. Most importantly, because Fae Essence is not bound to a user, it is ideal for automated scroll creation.
mahoutsukai.book.fae_essence.name: Fae Essence
mahoutsukai.book.familiar_exchange.desc: When used, the caster will switch places with the familiar if it exists. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.familiar_exchange.name: Familiar Exchange
mahoutsukai.book.familiars_garden.desc: When used while a familiar is active, the familiar will activate its garden. Mobs and players in the garden will not be able to harm each other. The affected area moves with the familiar, and particles are produced to show the area. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.familiars_garden.name: Familiar's Garden
mahoutsukai.book.fay_sight_eyes.desc: Very simply, this spell allows the player to see Leylines and the Fae. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.fay_sight_eyes.name: Mystic Eyes of Fay Sight
mahoutsukai.book.gems.desc: If you craft an Attuner with a Diamond or Emerald, you can get an attuned gem. These gems will store mana for you, if you right click while holding the gem. Spells will automatically draw from any gems on your person.
mahoutsukai.book.gems.name: Attuned Gems
mahoutsukai.book.gravity_boundary.desc: The Gravity Boundary increases the gravity for mobs other than the caster in an area of range %%val2. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.gravity_boundary.name: Магический круг гравитации
mahoutsukai.book.immunity_exchange.desc: This scroll can be used on either the player or something the player is looking at. The target of the scroll will take no damage from repeated damage sources, but will take double damage from a damage source that was different from the last one. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.immunity_exchange.name: Immunity Exchange
mahoutsukai.book.insight.desc: The Mystic Eyes of Insight allow the user to see more information about a target, such as its inventory, and, in the case of living creatures, their buffs, debuffs, etc. The mana cost is %%val0 per scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.insight.name: Mystic Eyes of Insight
mahoutsukai.book.intro.desc: Mahou Tsukai, по сути, тот кто использует магию. Поздравляем! Вы тоже являетесь таковым. %%n%%nДля начала, давайте узнаем, как начертить круг кровью. Всё просто - получите урон и быстро нажмите на клавишу %%k чтобы нарисовать кровавый круг на полу. Если всё сделано верно, вы увидете на земле кровавый круг, а так же шкалу маны (Mahou X/Y) где-то на вашем экране. Напоминаем: Есть кинжал, которым можно нанести себе незначительный урон, если вам так удобно.
mahoutsukai.book.intro.name: Mahou Tsukai
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku.desc: Кодоку отсылает к практике разжигания конфликта между несколькими живыми существами и последующим использованием эссенции сильнейшего из них с помощью червей-кодоку. %%n %%nКаждый раз, когда монстр обрывает чью-то жизнь, their kodoku value goes up by 1, plus the kodoku value of the monster it killed. When you have a specimen with a high kodoku value, simply place a hungry kodoku worm on it (right-click) and kill the specimen.
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku.name: Кодоку
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku2.desc: When a worm consumes the essence of a mob with a high kodoku value, you can simply right-click to pick it up. Worms with high kodoku values have a number of uses. %%n %%nWhen burned, these worms will generate mana for any nearby mana circuits. The amount of mana depends on how close to a leyline the burning occurred. %%n%%nThese worms can also be used for sympathetic magic.
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku2.name: Kodoku (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku3.desc: Sympathetic Magic refers to a symbolic magic, in which a target can be affected remotely through the use of a symbol. %%n%%nTo use a scrying circle for sympathetic magic, it must be actively scrying something. Also, an inventory under the scrying circle must contain Kodoku worms to act as fuel. Worms with higher kodoku values will increase the chance of successful sympathetic magic.
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku3.name: Sympathetic Magic
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku4.desc: When an active scrying circle with Kodoku worms underneath is set up, simply throw items for various effects on top of the circle. %%n%%nBlaze Powder - Fire%%n%%nRabbit Foot - Hop%%n%%nSplash Potions - Effects%%n%%nGlowstone Dust - Glowing%%n%%n(Effects continued on next page.)
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku4.name: Sympathetic Magic (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku5.desc: %%nRotten Flesh - Hunger%%n%%nKodoku worms - Misfortune %%n%%nMisfortune applies various effects such as being struck by lightning, dropping items, negative looting, tripping, breaking tools, increased aggro, with chances scaling depending on the quality of the worm.%%n%%n(Effects continued on next page.)
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku5.name: Sympathetic Magic (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku6.desc: %%nEnder Pearl - Teleports target (Players must have a contract with caster to be teleported)%%n%%nNether Wart - Confusion
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku6.name: Sympathetic Magic (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku7.desc: You can counter sympathetic magic against yourself by keeping a worm with a high kodoku value in your inventory. The higher the value, the less likely the magic will succeed against you, and there's even a chance it will be reflected to the caster.
mahoutsukai.book.kodoku7.name: Countering Sympathetic Magic
mahoutsukai.book.leylines.desc: Leylines connect certain points throughout the world. They can only be seen with Mystic Eyes of Fay Sight. Being near a leyline or leypoint increases mana regeneration based on a percentage of your maximum mana. %%n%%nThe Fae spawn near leylines.%%n%%nFurthermore, Leylines will boost elytra if you fly along the leyline.
mahoutsukai.book.leylines.name: Leylines
mahoutsukai.book.magic.desc: To perform Magic, we need a few things - mana, (optionally, depending on the recipe) a cloth, a blood circle, and 3 powdered catalysts. If the recipe is for a scroll, you'd put the cloth down first, and then draw a blood circle on top. Otherwise, simply put the circle on the floor. Take your powdered catalysts and right click the circle to add them to it.
mahoutsukai.book.magic.name: Performing Magic
mahoutsukai.book.mana.desc: Using mana increases your maximum mana capacity over time - it's like exercising. You will naturally recover some mana over time, depending on how full your hunger is. Sleeping will regen a good chunk of your mana, and sleep is important, so sleep often!
mahoutsukai.book.mana.name: Mana
mahoutsukai.book.mental_displacement.des: A mental displacement scroll allows the caster to temporarily leave his body behind and explore the world in a certain radius. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.morgan.desc: This wicked sword is the result of the corruption of the holy sword Caliburn. Obtained through the murder of a player's best and most loyal friend with the holy sword Caliburn, this sword obtains its power not from a mysterious lake, but from the killing of innocents.%%n%%nVillagers, and more so, child villagers, provide a damage bonus for this sword, and also heal any damage the sword has.
mahoutsukai.book.morgan.name: Morgan
mahoutsukai.book.morgan2.desc: Holding right click with this sword releases a ball of evil to stab and pull nearby enemies. Lastly, pressing the keybind %%k with the sword equipped provides a Rage effect, which very briefly boosts attack speed and walking speed. %%n%%nBoth of these abilities invoke a cooldown that prevents either from being used.
mahoutsukai.book.morgan2.name: Morgan (cont.)
mahoutsukai.book.mystic_code.desc: The Mystic Code is an item which holds three stacks of scrolls. Shift right click opens the inventory. The keybind %%k switches between the scrolls. Clicking or holding right click uses the currently selected scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.mystic_code.name: Mystic Code
mahoutsukai.book.mystic_code_first_sorce: The Mystic Code - First Sorcery is a variant of the mystic code, which has a set durability, but also allows for the reuse of scrolls it contains.
mahoutsukai.book.no_cloth.name: Без ткани
mahoutsukai.book.ordered_displacement.de: Круг упорядоченного переноса на земле телепортирует всё, что на него попадёт к ближайшему кругу упорядоченного переноса. Если имеется несколько кругов, перенос буде тосуществляться в порядке установки кругов. Вы можете присесть чтобы остановить процесс телепортации. %%n %%nКруг потребляет %%val0 маны за каждый перенос.
mahoutsukai.book.power_consolidation.des: После установки, данный круг начнёт образовывать озеро. Каждое расширение озера требует %%val0 маны. Когда озеро достигнет максимального размера, вы можете бросить туда зачарованный меч, чтобы получить Экскалибур, святой меч, что будет обладать уроном меча, плюс бонус от зачарования. (результат будет лучше, если меч уже был святым!) %%n %%nБросок меча в озеро будет стоить %%val1 маны.
mahoutsukai.book.power_consolidation2.de: Святой меч, Экскалибур, обладает рядом свойств. Во-первых, нежить и порочные существа будут бояться его и попытаются сбежать, лишь завидев. Во-вторых, зажатие ПКМ при взгляде на монстра "подтянет" владельца меча к нему. Ну и что не менее важно, процесс Консолидации силы может быть проведён вновь если меч заново зачаровать.
mahoutsukai.book.projectile_displacement: Свиток переноса к снаряду перенесёт вас к выпущенной вам стреле. %%n %%nСвиток потребляет %%val0 10 маны за одно использование.
mahoutsukai.book.projection.desc: The first use of this scroll memorizes a tool or weapon you're looking at (for the whole stack!). The second use gives you a copy of the tool with limited durability. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster each time the scroll is used.
mahoutsukai.book.projection.name: Projection
mahoutsukai.book.projector.desc: The Mahoujin Projector is a decorative block, which simply displayes runes and a magic circle. Right clicking on the block allows you to configure the size, angle, color, speed, etc. You can load in custom circles and runes through the config.
mahoutsukai.book.projector.name: Mahoujin Projector
mahoutsukai.book.protective_displacement: Вы никогда не задумывались о том, каково быть эндерменом? Свиток безопасного переноса телепортирует вас в случайное место когда вы рискуете получить лишнюю стрелу в своём теле. %%n %%nСвиток потребляет %%val0 маны от владельца за использование и обеспечивает несколько телепортаций, не зависящих от времени.
mahoutsukai.book.proximity_projection.de: Using this scroll grants the caster a weapon, which allows the caster to simultaneously teleport to and attack an entity they can see at long range. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use of the scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.reality_marble.desc: This scroll teleports the user (and optionally, a target the user is looking at) to a fixed spot in the Reality Marble. If the user has a target, one of the two must die for the other to leave. Otherwise, taking damage will allow the player to leave. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.reality_marble.name: Reality Marble
mahoutsukai.book.recall_familiar.desc: When used, the player's familiar, if it exists, will be recalled to the player. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on use.
mahoutsukai.book.recall_familiar.name: Recall Familiar
mahoutsukai.book.retribution.desc: A Scroll of Retribution exchanges the health percentage of the caster with the health percentage of the target. It drains mana based on the difference between the user and target's health. The cost is %%val0 times the difference in health points.
mahoutsukai.book.retribution.name: Retribution
mahoutsukai.book.reversion_eyes.desc: When used, mobs and players in the caster's view will lose their buffs, along with certain other qualities, depending on the mob. Water mobs will no longer breathe underwater - nether mobs will be affected by fire and lava. Endermen, Shulker boxes and the Wither will no longer be immune to arrows. Husks can catch fire in the sun. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.reversion_eyes.name: Mystic Eyes of Reversion
mahoutsukai.book.rho_aias.desc: Данный свиток создаёт огромный щит перед использователем в направлении использования. Мобы отскакивают от него, а снаряды отражаются. Если нужно, сам использователь заклинания может отскочить от щита, если подойдёт к ним крадучись. %%n %%nОн потребляет %%val0 маны за использование.
mahoutsukai.book.rho_aias.name: Ро Аяс
mahoutsukai.book.scrying.desc: A Scrying circle on the ground allows the player to see a named mob or player from afar, for a short amount of time. Simply drop a nametag on the circle, and if a mob or player with this name exists, it will be shown with its surroundings. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster per nametag.
mahoutsukai.book.scrying.name: Scrying
mahoutsukai.book.shared_vision.desc: When used on a mob or player, the caster will see through its eyes. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.shared_vision.name: Shared Vision
Using this scroll summons a staff which can be used on an entity to launch them in the direction the caster is looking. Longer charge time provides more velocity. Alternatively, when used on a block, nearby entities will be pulled in and launched, after a charge up time. %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use of the scroll, %%val1 mana when used on an entity, and %%val2 mana per second when used in AOE mode.
mahoutsukai.book.strengthening.desc: A Strengthening scroll will strengthen the first thing on your hotbar, or your off-hand if you're holding something. Strengthened items are temporarily unbreakable, do more damage, and have increased mining capabilities. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use.
mahoutsukai.book.strengthening.name: Strengthening
mahoutsukai.book.summon_familiar.desc: When used, the player summons a familiar. This familiar will report on interesting players, mobs, and blocks that it sees, and will chunk load the area around it. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on use.
mahoutsukai.book.summon_familiar.name: Summon Familiar
mahoutsukai.book.tangible_boundary.desc: The Tangible Boundary is a large invisible barrier with range %%val2 that you can pass through, but mobs, arrows, and other entities cannot. It will not replace solid blocks other than grass, nor will it replace water. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster every %%val1 second(s).
mahoutsukai.book.tangible_boundary.name: Магический круг материальной стены
mahoutsukai.book.treasury_projection.des: This scroll give the user a gauntlet which will project weapons and tools from the user's treasury - their inventory, some modded bags, and their ender chest, and fling them at the target block they are looking at. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana on using the scroll, and %%val1 mana per weapon projected.
mahoutsukai.book.treasury_projection2.de: The gauntlet has two alternate modes upon pressing shift right-click. In AOE mode, weapons will be fired from behind you towards the direction you're looking at, and in Chains mode, chains will spawn near the target you're looking at and, if the target is a creature, attempt to hit them when right-click is held while staring at it.
mahoutsukai.book.weapon_projectiles.desc: Using this scroll grants the caster a bow, which can shoot tools and weapons. %%n %%nIt drains %%val0 mana from the caster on use of the scroll.
mahoutsukai.book.weapon_projectiles.name: Weapon Projectiles
mahoutsukai.clarent.wounded: You've been wounded. Try not to move too much or it may get worse.

mahoutsukai.config.ley_punishment.commen: This value is added to mana regen. It is the floor for mana added by leylines. By default, you lose 1 mana from regen for not being near a leyline.

mahoutsukai.entityFoundFollowUp6: Я не расплачусь, если ты это убьёшь.
mahoutsukai.holiday1greeting6: Hashire sori yo, kaze no you ni.. Oh,
mahoutsukai.holiday2greeting2: Roses are red, Master is you..
mahoutsukai.holiday2greeting6: I'm so in love I could fly! Wait, could I already do that?
mahoutsukai.holiday3greeting1: They're after me lucky - wait, that's under copyright.
mahoutsukai.holiday3greeting2: Do the Fae celebrate St. Patrick's Day?
mahoutsukai.holiday3greeting3: I SWEAR I SAW A LEPRECHAUN JUST THE OTHER DAY I'M NOT LYING!
mahoutsukai.holiday3greeting4: What's the tradition? If you don't wear green a creeper blows up your base?
mahoutsukai.holiday3greeting5: I mean, a pot of gold is like 5 bars of gold in Minecraft, so it's not that impressive.
mahoutsukai.holiday3greeting6: Ugh, I'm green for St. Patrick's Day, not out of envy,
mahoutsukai.kodoku.failed: Your sympathetic magic has failed.. Perhaps a stronger kodoku?
mahoutsukai.teleport_kodoku.failed: Perhaps you need a contract with this target.item.clarent.name=Clarent
